title: David McCormack vs. Armando Bacot a Matchup to Watch in NCAA Championship
description: Armando Bacot of North Carolina and David McCormack of Kansas have been two critical players for their teams, and will almost certainly have key roles in the championship game.
dc:creator: Alanis Thames
media:description: Armando Bacot of North Carolina set a single-season record for double-doubles in the Atlantic Coast Conference.
